attributes.action: Create a cap or limit on the amount that the Water Companies intend to increase rates because of the recent flooding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Water Companies in the UK make massive amounts of profit (One in particular made £300 million last year) in order to pay out to dividends to shareholders.
They should be made to reinvest more in putting their own house in order, to repair leaks and make flood defences a lot better than they are at present.
Water is a necessary human need and should not be in the hands of profiteering Companies, most of whom are not even under UK control.
